title: Build a Better Dragon
teaser: Mechas are hard to make, especially feral dragon ones. When Tiemeth the dragon shows up, he gets some interesting ideas...
summary: Crestor, trying to make a dragon mecha, gives up and instead turns Tiemeth into a mecha, complete with a cock tube and a vibrating anal plug, both of which are remote-controlled to "train" the "mecha". He then shows Endium the mecha, which ends up being a fiasco.
